channel.title: Automation Kit for Power Platform
channel.description: Recent content on Automation Kit for Power Platform

item.title: Customer Stories
item.description: Introduction Want to see how customers or partners have used with the Automation Kit? This page will reference public customer stories and feedback using the Automation Kit. Cineplex Read more on the Cineplex digital transformation with Power Automate RPA led by citizen developers story.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Introduction This page contains a set of frequently asked questions related to the Automation Kit. If you cannot find an answer to a question you have consider creating a Feature Request to update this page. Question groups in this page: Getting Started Question: What is the best way for me to get started? Support Question: How do I get support installing or operating the Automation Kit? Automation Center of Excellence Question: How is the Automation Kit related to the CoE Kit?

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Introduction Getting started can be one of the key blockers to evaluating and using the Automation Kit in your organization. You can use the interactive form below to step you through the getting started process. You can also use the Introduction of the learning content to provide an overview of the Automation Kit. The Automation Center of Excellence strategy with the Automation Kit can also be used to provide context on how the Automation Kit can help your Automation Center of Excellence.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Register ðŸ“† Register for our office hours session https://aka.ms/ak4ppofficehours Tell Me More This meeting is a regular forum for customers and partners to learn and ask questions about the Automation Kit for Power Platform. Come prepared to ask questions about existing features, learn how something works and new features you’d like to see. Please note: This session will be attended by multiple customers and partners and will be recorded. Please state any questions with the appropriate level of detail for this broader audience.

item.title: Support
item.description: Getting Started The Getting Started Guidance provides some interactive questions to link you to sources of information that could help you to get started. Getting further support Guidance on getting further support for the Automation Kit: Refer to our Feedback and support page for general guidance Use our Automation Kit Learn pages to step through the install and usage instructions Use the Automation Kit Issues templates for search for known Bugs / Feature gaps.
